game_description: Enjoy thrilling attractions such as the Twister, the Haunted House, the Octopus, the Kamikaze, the Viking Ship or the Roller Coaster. There are also less challenging attractions, such as the Ferris Wheel, the Balloon ride, the Free Fall or the bowling alley. FunnyLand is a magical place where you can feel each and every attraction thanks to the power of virtual reality. The attractions available at the moment are as follows Condor Kamikaze Pirate Ship Bowling Ferris wheel Roller coaster Haunted house Top Scan Fly away Octopus Booster Flying Circus Frisbee Free fall Balloon ride Spider hands (Throw spider webs and move around the park as if you were a superhero) Iron Hands (Put thrusters on your hands and fly like the legendary superhero)
